New Records: India won by their fifth-biggest margin in T20Is
Dinesh Karthik scored his first half-century in T20Is after 16 years and 36 matches
Key Match Events: 65-run partnership between Dinesh Karthik and Hardik Pandya for the fifth wicket
Avesh Khan took four wickets including three in one over
Lungi Ngidi bowled an economical spell of 2 for 20 in three overs
Post-Match Reflections: Steyn: Karthik will be among the first names in India's T20 World Cup squad
Bavuma's night ended worse than Pant's when he had to retire hurt for his joint-lowest score of the series so far, 8
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's line-up was not able to adapt to the pace of the pitch or India's bowling and were dismissed for their lowest total in T20Is
Only three of their batters got into double figures
